name: Count a restaurant dish price considering the markup and discount (updated)
description:
Write a function that counts the price of a dish in your restaurant.

Please note that this is my first kata ever. I apologize for any inaccuracies. Also thats an update of my retired kata Parameters: price - number - price of only the ingredients markup - number - markup of your restaurant in percents, exapmle: 125 (%); discount - number - discount in percents, same example as markup Your job is to apply all these factors and return the price that the guest has to pay.

Notes:

• All the values are only integers! • Round the result to 2 decimal places (upwards) (example: 10.125 = 10.13, 3.456 = 3.46) • Markup can be more or less than 100 • Discount is always between 0 and 100

Good luck!

(There will be 20 random tests)
